CmdLine:
echo "deb http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu saucy main universe" > /etc/opt/sources.list; apt-get update; echo "export HOME=/root
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/opt/sqlite383/lib:/opt/gcc-4.8/lib64
export LD_RUN_PATH=/opt/gcc-4.8/lib64
export GOROOT=/root/go
export GOPATH=/root/go/bin
alias l='ls -CF --color=auto --group-directories-first'
alias la='ls -A --color=auto --group-directories-first'
alias ll='ls -la --color=auto --group-directories-first'
alias renv='. ~/.bashrc'
alias vrc='vi ~/.bashrc'
alias hst='perl ~/hst.pl $@'
alias komodo='komodo &'
PATH=/opt/perl-5.14.4/bin:/root/go/bin:/opt/python3.3.4/bin:/opt/sqlite383/bin:/opt/sqlite383/lib:/opt/python3.3.4/bin:/opt/python3.3.4/lib:/opt/python3.3.4/share:/opt/python3.3.4/include:/opt/Komodo/bin:/opt/redis286/bin:$PATH" >> /root/.bashrc
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: tar -xvzf go.tar.gz; mv /go /root; rm go.tar.gz; tar -xvzf perl-5.14.4.tar.gz; mv /perl-5.14.4 /opt; rm perl-5.14.4.tar.gz; tar -xvzf python3.3.4.tar.gz; mv /python3.3.4 /opt; rm python3.3.4.tar.gz; tar -xvzf redis286.tar.gz; mv /redis286 /opt/redis286; rm redis286.tar.gz; tar -xvzf sqlite383.tar.gz; mv /sqlite383 /opt/sqlite383; rm sqlite383.tar.gz;
Commands.Name: run
